articles.title: King Charles to make first Christmas speech - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
King Charles III will make his first speech on Christmas Day, marking the second time he has addressed the country following the death of his mother. 

Queen Elizabeth II had delivered every televised festive speech since the inaugural broadcast in 1957.
